00043 #ifndef FLASH_DRV_H
00044 #define FLASH_DRV_H
00045 
00046 //_____ I N C L U D E S ______________________________________________________
00047 
00048 #include "config.h"
00049 
00050 
00051 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00052 
00055 #define Flash_read_id1()            ( flash_read_sig(0x0000))  
00056 #define Flash_read_id2()            ( flash_read_sig(0x0002))  
00057 #define Flash_read_id3()            ( flash_read_sig(0x0004))  
00058 #define Flash_read_osccal()         ( flash_read_sig(0x0001))  
00059 
00060 
00063 #define Flash_read_fuse_low()       ( flash_read_fuse(0x0000)) 
00064 #define Flash_read_fuse_high()      ( flash_read_fuse(0x0003)) 
00065 #define Flash_read_fuse_extended()  ( flash_read_fuse(0x0002)) 
00066 #define Flash_read_lock()           ( flash_read_fuse(0x0001)) 
00067 
00068 
00071 #define Is_OCD_enable()             (0==(Flash_read_fuse_high()&(1<<FUSE_OCDEN_bp)))  
00072 #define Is_JTAG_enable()            (0==(Flash_read_fuse_high()&(1<<FUSE_JTAGEN_bp))) 
00073 
00074 
00075 
00078 #define FUSE_BOOTRST_bp    0  // Select Reset Vector
00079 #define FUSE_BOOTSZ0_bp    1  // Select Boot Size
00080 #define FUSE_BOOTSZ1_bp    2  // Select Boot Size
00081 #define FUSE_EESAVE_bp     3  // EEPROM memory is preserved through chip erase
00082 #define FUSE_WDTON_bp      4  // Watchdog timer always on
00083 #define FUSE_SPIEN_bp      5  // Enable Serial programming and Data Downloading
00084 #define FUSE_JTAGEN_bp     6  // Enable JTAG
00085 #define FUSE_OCDEN_bp      7  // Enable OCD
00087 
00088 
00089 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ____________________________________________
00090 
00097 U8    flash_read_sig(unsigned long adr);
00098 
00105 U8    flash_read_fuse(unsigned long adr);

00107 
00108 #endif  // FLASH_DRV_H
